titleInfo.title: B'nai B'rith 171 - Alta Cohen's Installation as President of B'nai B'rith Women

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Alta Cohen's installation as president B'nai B'rith Women, #408, B'nai B'rith Women.'' Stamped on back of photograph: ''Albert O. Corwin, Technical Photographer, 3227 Albion St. - Dexter 2843, Denver 7, Colorado.''

mods.abstract: Members of B'nai B'rith and B'nai B'rith Women gathered at the B'nai B'rith building in Denver, Colorado for the installation of Alta Cohen as president of B'nai B'rith Women.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
